name: Jakarta Urban Transit Management System
description: Developed a comprehensive transit management dashboard for Jakarta's public transportation network, handling real-time data from 200+ bus routes and 50+ train stations.
contribution: Built the entire frontend interface using HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript, implementing real-time data visualization with Chart.js. Created responsive layouts that work seamlessly on mobile devices used by transit operators. Optimized API calls to Python backend, reducing load times by 40%. Fixed critical bugs in route calculation algorithms and implemented error handling for network failures.

name: Manila E-Commerce Platform for Local Artisans
description: Created a full-stack e-commerce solution connecting local Filipino artisans with international buyers, featuring multi-currency support and localized payment gateways.
contribution: Designed and implemented the complete user interface using modern CSS Grid and Flexbox layouts. Developed JavaScript shopping cart functionality with local storage persistence. Built Python backend APIs for product management, order processing, and payment integration. Implemented image optimization techniques reducing page load times by 55%. Created responsive design ensuring optimal experience across all device types.

name: Bucharest Healthcare Appointment System
description: Developed a digital appointment booking system for a network of 15+ clinics in Bucharest, reducing no-show rates by 30% through automated reminders and scheduling optimization.
contribution: Architected the frontend using semantic HTML5 and CSS3 with a focus on accessibility (WCAG 2.1 compliance). Implemented complex scheduling logic in JavaScript handling timezone conversions and multi-language support. Built secure Python REST APIs for appointment management with proper authentication. Created admin dashboard for clinic staff with real-time availability tracking. Optimized database queries reducing API response time by 50%.

name: Lagos Agricultural Supply Chain Tracker
description: Built a supply chain management system tracking agricultural products from farms to markets across Lagos state, improving traceability and reducing food waste by 25%.
contribution: Developed interactive data visualization dashboards using JavaScript and D3.js for supply chain analytics. Created responsive mobile-first design enabling field workers to update inventory using smartphones. Built Python backend with data processing scripts handling thousands of daily transactions. Implemented real-time GPS tracking integration for delivery vehicles. Optimized image compression for product photos, reducing storage costs by 35%.

name: Ho Chi Minh City Smart Parking Solution
description: Created an IoT-integrated smart parking management system for Ho Chi Minh City, connecting 500+ parking spaces with real-time availability tracking and mobile payment integration.
contribution: Designed intuitive user interface with HTML5 and CSS3 featuring real-time parking map visualization. Developed JavaScript frontend handling WebSocket connections for live updates. Built Python backend APIs processing sensor data from IoT devices. Implemented payment gateway integration supporting local Vietnamese payment methods. Created admin panel for parking operators with analytics and revenue tracking. Reduced average parking search time by 60% through intelligent routing algorithms.

name: Dhaka Textile Inventory Management
description: Developed inventory management system for a textile manufacturing company in Dhaka, tracking raw materials and finished products across multiple warehouses.
contribution: Created comprehensive dashboard using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with real-time inventory updates. Built Python scripts for automated inventory calculations and low-stock alerts. Implemented barcode scanning integration for quick product entry. Designed responsive interface for warehouse staff using tablets. Reduced inventory discrepancies by 45% through automated tracking.

name: Sofia University Course Registration Portal

contribution: Developed user-friendly registration interface with HTML5 forms and CSS3 styling. Implemented JavaScript validation and dynamic course filtering. Created Python backend managing student enrollment data and course capacity. Built conflict detection system preventing double-booking. Reduced registration processing time from 2 weeks to 2 days.

name: Nairobi Microfinance Loan Management

Increased loan processing efficiency by 50%.

name: Kathmandu Weather Alert System

contribution: Created alert dashboard using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with real-time updates. Built Python backend processing weather data from multiple sources. Implemented SMS and email notification system. Developed map visualization showing affected areas. Created mobile-responsive interface for farmers. Reduced weather-related crop losses by 30%.

name: IoT Smart Home Relay Control System
description: A comprehensive IoT Smart Home Relay Control System where ESP32-C6 devices installed in every switch board control multiple relays (lights, fans, appliances). The system operates through a local mesh network without requiring internet, with mobile app control via BLE connectivity. Fully functional offline with optional cloud sync for remote access.
contribution: Developed unified ESP32-C6 firmware implementing mesh network management and BLE gateway functionality. Built complete Android mobile application with BLE scanning, device pairing, and real-time relay control. Implemented mesh network routing system enabling devices to communicate without internet connectivity. Created command routing logic where mobile app connects via BLE to nearest ESP device, which forwards commands through mesh network to target devices. Developed real-time status synchronization across all ESP devices and mobile app. Implemented offline-first architecture ensuring full functionality without Wi-Fi or internet. Built relay control drivers and device identification system. Created multi-user support allowing multiple family members to control devices simultaneously. Designed local state replication system for real-time updates across the network.
